channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:15 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:15 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291

item.title: 🔴 13:39 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!

Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
